name: The Affair at Victory Ball
description:
Are you ready to solve the mystery? Take on the role of Hercule Poirot and learn about the affair at Victory Ball! Talk to different characters and use your sleuthing skills to uncover the culprit of the crime. With your trusty side-kick Hastings, you will need to discover the events that took place and who is culpable for the crime!

.

This game is directly inspired by the short story by Agatha Christie. If you love mysteries, be sure to check this game out. It includes original art by Regina Cicone and added text by Leona Cicone. This game is the debut work of the Cicone sister team.  As fans of the point and click genre, they hope to make more mini games like this one and bring to life the works of Agatha Christie.
